name: Rebirth Of The Urban Immortal Cultivator
author: Daxingdao Anime
content: Rebirth Of The Urban Immortal Cultivator summary: During the anti-cataclysm period, the monk Chen Fanyu fell into the catastrophe of the day, but he dreamed of returning to the earthâ€™s young age in five hundred years. In the last life, I was on the top of the universe, overlooking the world, but no one was accompanied. This world is only willing to live with the right person. After 500 years, the immortal reborn and returned to the city, to make up for the regret and play the story of pretending
